name: Language Town
description:
You've woken up in a foreign town and must find where you're supposed to meet your translator. Use the signs and your note from the night before to figure out where to go. Hurry up and figure it out before you starve or get arrested!

Game can be played in Japanese or Spanish

The game was made for Shanty Jam Lvl 5.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Attempt to enter building

Credits:

Game design: Jorden and Charles Grady

Programming: Charles Grady

Art: Jorden Grady
